entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 34. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 29 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 16 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight with 60 percent chance of snow overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 16 by morning. Wind chill minus 30 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 10 February 2023
